title: Haz Substance Remediation
description: Technical aspects of hazardous waste management and treatment including legislation, exposure and risk assessment, contaminant fate and transport, waste treatment methods, and remediation technologies.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CEE 2300 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (CEE 3040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ME 3340 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
